Give the names of the two main major components of cement

part2.question: Name the main source of the calcium in the clinker and what process or processes does raw material goes through during the formation of clinker
part2.answer: The main sources of the calcium is limestone or calcium carbonate and during the process it decomposes to calcium oxide during the heating and then the calcium oxide reacts with silica or aluminium oxide or aluminium hydroxide to form the trioxosilicate and dioxoaluminate
